pkgmetadata.longdescription: Validity fingerprint sensor driver. To enable fingerprint login, if it doesn't come automatically, run sudo pam-auth-update, and use the space-bar to enable fingerprint authentication. The change will take effect immediately. At this point, the fingerprint will be tried first, and only if that fails or times out will you see a password prompt. Take note of the led-stripe above the fingerprint sensor to see whether it is active.
